thread.title: Hoor Jehan Noorani
thread.title_full: Bravofly.com reviewed by Hoor Jehan Noorani

author: Hoor Jehan Noorani
title: Hoor Jehan Noorani
text: I booked my flight today through bravofly on skyscanner and the rate on the bravofly page was AUD 2217 - "Rates, taxes and fees included". (I even have a pint screen of the page as proof as I had read the negative comments). However, I have been charged almost AUD 100 extra!
